<style>
  /* --- Compact, centered, stuck under navbar --- */
  .announcement-bar{
    position: fixed;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    top: var(--ann-top, 56px);          /* 由 JS 计算导航栏高度后写入 */
    z-index: 1050;                      /* 高过内容，低于你可能的浮动搜索按钮 */
    display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center;
    gap: .55em;
    background: #eaf3ff;
    color: #07315c;
    border: 1px solid #bfd9ff;
    border-radius: 999px;               /* 胶囊形 */
    box-shadow: 0 4px 14px rgba(0,0,0,.12);
    padding: .38em .8em;                /* 紧凑 */
    font: 600 0.9rem/1.2 system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Arial, sans-serif;
    white-space: nowrap;
    max-width: min(92vw, 900px);
  }
  .announcement-bar.compact strong{ font-weight: 700 }
  .announcement-bar a{
    color: #c46800; font-weight: 700; text-decoration: none;
  }
  .announcement-bar a:hover{ text-decoration: underline }

  .announcement-bar .ann-close{
    margin-left: .25em;
    inline-size: 28px; block-size: 28px;
    border: 0; border-radius: 50%;
    background: transparent; color: inherit;
    font-size: 1.05rem; line-height: 1; cursor: pointer;
  }
  .announcement-bar .ann-close:hover{ background: rgba(0,0,0,.08) }
  .announcement-bar .emoji{ font-size: 1.05em }

  /* Toggle button: fixed at same top,靠右，不遮挡内容 */
  .ann-toggle{
    position: fixed;
    right: 14px;
    top: calc(var(--ann-top, 56px) + 2px);
    z-index: 1049;
    padding: .35em .7em;
    border: 1px solid #bfd9ff;
    border-radius: 999px;
    background: #f5faff; color: #07315c;
    font: 600 .88rem/1.1 system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Arial, sans-serif;
    cursor: pointer;
    box-shadow: 0 3px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.08);
  }
  .ann-toggle:hover{ background: #eaf3ff }

  /* Dark mode */
  @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark){
    .announcement-bar{
      background: #0e2742; color:#e6f0ff; border-color:#294b73;
      box-shadow: 0 4px 18px rgba(0,0,0,.45);
    }
    .announcement-bar a{ color:#ffb662 }
    .ann-toggle{ background:#12375d; color:#e6f0ff; border-color:#294b73 }
    .ann-toggle:hover{ background:#0e2742 }
    .announcement-bar .ann-close:hover{ background: rgba(255,255,255,.08) }
  }

  /* Reduce motion */
  @media (prefers-reduced-motion: no-preference){
    .announcement-bar, .ann-toggle { transition: opacity .18s ease, transform .18s ease; }
  }
</style>

<script>
  (function(){
    const VERSION = '2025-08-28-topbar-v1';
    const KEY = 'announce:dismissed';
    const bar = document.getElementById('announce');
    const toggle = document.getElementById('ann-toggle');

    // 计算导航栏高度，贴紧其下方
    function computeTop(){
      const candidates = [
        document.getElementById('quarto-header'),
        document.querySelector('header.navbar'),
        document.querySelector('.navbar.navbar-expand'),
        document.querySelector('header.site-header'),
      ].filter(Boolean);
      const nav = candidates[0];
      const h = nav ? nav.getBoundingClientRect().height : 56;
      document.documentElement.style.setProperty('--ann-top', (Math.round(h) + 6) + 'px');
    }
    computeTop();
    window.addEventListener('resize', computeTop);

    // 初始化显示：若没被关闭过，则显示条，隐藏按钮
    try {
      const dismissed = localStorage.getItem(KEY);
      if (dismissed !== VERSION) { bar.hidden = false; toggle.hidden = true; }
      else { bar.hidden = true; toggle.hidden = false; }
    } catch (_) { bar.hidden = false; }

    // 关闭
    bar.querySelector('.ann-close').addEventListener('click', () => {
      bar.hidden = true;
      toggle.hidden = false;
      try { localStorage.setItem(KEY, VERSION); } catch(_) {}
    });

    // 打开
    toggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
      bar.hidden = false;
      toggle.hidden = true;
      try { localStorage.removeItem(KEY); } catch(_) {}
    });

    // Esc 快速关闭
    bar.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => { if (e.key === 'Escape') bar.querySelector('.ann-close').click(); });
  })();
</script>
